FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “Guaranteed to leave your enemies sufficiently stabbed, bitten, cleaved, or exploded.” —Grezkrick’s Emporium motto
« Poignardement, morsure, tranchage et dislocation de l’ennemi garantis sur facture. » —Devise du Bazar de Grezkrick
“Garantizamos que dejará a sus enemigos lo bastante apuñalados, mordidos, rajados o reventados.” —Lema del Emporio de Grezkrick
„Ausreichende Erstechung, Zerfleischung, Zerfetzung oder Explosion deiner Feinde garantiert!“ —Motto von Grezkricks Warenhaus
“Vuoi vedere i tuoi nemici pugnalati, morsi, spezzati o esplosi quanto basta? Affidati a noi, risultati garantiti.” —Motto dell’Emporio di Grezkrick
「あなたの敵に十分な刺し傷と噛み傷、そして肉削ぎと爆破を与えます。」 —グレズクリーク商店のモットー
“적을 확실하게 찌르거나 물거나 절단하거나 터트리는 무기만을 엄선해서 공급합니다.” —그레즈크릭의 만물상 모토
«Гарантируем: враг будет успешно зарезан, ужален, разрублен или взорван». — Девиз магазина Грезкрика
“Inimigos suficientemente perfurados, mordidos, partidos ou explodidos, ou seu dinheiro de volta.” — slogan do Empório do Grezkrick

COST.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddSubType( CREATURE_TYPE_GOBLIN ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted()

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_creature = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if ( target_creature ~= nil ) then target_creature:DealDamage(4, source) end
